main course.name: Koshari
main course.description: A traditional Egyptian dish made with rice, lentils, pasta, and a spicy tomato sauce.
instructions: Cook rice, lentils, and pasta separately.
Mix them together in a bowl.
Add tomato sauce and spices.
Serve hot and enjoy!

main course.name: Molokhia
main course.description: A green soup made from jute leaves, served with rice or bread.
instructions: Boil chicken broth in a pot.
Add molokhia leaves and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add garlic, coriander, salt, and pepper.
Serve with rice or bread.

appetizers.name: Falafel
appetizers.description: Deep-fried balls made from ground fava beans or chickpeas, served with tahini sauce.
instructions: Soak chickpeas overnight.
Blend chickpeas, onion, garlic, and spices.
Form into balls and deep-fry until golden.
Serve with tahini sauce.

appetizers.name: Samosa
appetizers.description: Spiced potato-filled pastries, deep-fried to perfection.
instructions: Boil and mash potatoes.
Mix with peas and spices.
Fill samosa pastry and fold into triangles.
Deep-fry until crispy.

soup.name: Lentil Soup
soup.description: A hearty soup made from red lentils, onions, and spices.
instructions: Cook lentils in vegetable broth.
Sauté onions and garlic, then add to the soup.
Add cumin and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve hot with bread.

soup.name: Chicken Soup
soup.description: A comforting soup made with chicken, vegetables, and herbs.
instructions: Boil chicken in broth until cooked.
Add chopped vegetables and simmer for 30 minutes.
Season with salt, pepper, and herbs.
Serve hot.

dessert.name: Basbousa
dessert.description: A sweet semolina cake soaked in syrup, often topped with coconut.
instructions: Mix semolina, sugar, yogurt, and butter.
Bake at 350°F for 30 minutes.
Soak in syrup and top with coconut.
Serve chilled.

dessert.name: Umm Ali
dessert.description: A traditional Egyptian dessert made with pastry, milk, nuts, and raisins.
instructions: Bake puff pastry until golden.
Boil milk and sugar, then pour over pastry.
Top with nuts and raisins.
Bake for 10 minutes and serve warm.

main course.name: Pasta Carbonara
main course.description: A creamy pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry pancetta and garlic until crispy.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan in a bowl.
Combine cooked pasta with pancetta, then mix in the egg mixture.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and black pepper.

main course.name: Lasagna
main course.description: Layered pasta with meat sauce, béchamel, and cheese.
instructions: Cook lasagna sheets according to package instructions.
Brown ground beef with onion and garlic, then add tomato sauce.
Layer lasagna sheets, meat sauce, ricotta, and mozzarella.
Bake at 375°F for 30 minutes.
Let cool before serving.

appetizers.name: Bruschetta
appetizers.description: Toasted bread topped with tomatoes, basil, and olive oil.
instructions: Slice and toast the baguette.
Dice tomatoes and mix with basil, olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Spoon the mixture onto the toasted bread.
Serve immediately.

appetizers.name: Caprese Salad
appetizers.description: A simple salad with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella.
Arrange them on a plate with basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately.

soup.name: Minestrone Soup
soup.description: A hearty vegetable soup with pasta and beans.
instructions: Sauté onion, carrots, and celery in olive oil.
Add vegetable broth and bring to a boil.
Add pasta and beans, then simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve hot with bread.

soup.name: Zuppa Toscana Soup
soup.description: A creamy soup with sausage, potatoes, and kale.
instructions: Brown sausage in a pot, then add onion and potatoes.
Add chicken broth and simmer until potatoes are tender.
Stir in kale and heavy cream.
Serve hot.

dessert.name: Tiramisu
dessert.description: A classic Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.
instructions: Whisk egg yolks and sugar until creamy, then fold in mascarpone.
Dip ladyfingers in coffee and layer them in a dish.
Spread mascarpone mixture over the ladyfingers.
Repeat layers, then dust with cocoa powder.
Chill for 4 hours before serving.

dessert.name: Panna Cotta
dessert.description: A creamy dessert with vanilla and berry sauce.
instructions: Heat cream and sugar until sugar dissolves.
Add vanilla and gelatin, then pour into molds.
Chill for 4 hours until set.
Top with berry sauce before serving.

main course.name: Tacos
main course.description: Soft or crispy tortillas filled with meat, vegetables, and toppings.
ingredients: Toppings: lettuce, cheese, salsa, sour cream
instructions: Cook ground beef in a pan until browned.
Add taco seasoning and water, simmer for 5 minutes.
Fill tortillas with beef, lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese.
Serve with salsa and sour cream.

main course.name: Enchiladas
main course.description: Tortillas rolled around a filling and covered with chili sauce.
instructions: Mix chicken, onion, and cumin.
Fill tortillas with the mixture and roll them up.
Place in a baking dish, cover with sauce and cheese.
Bake at 375°F for 20 minutes.
Serve hot.

appetizers.name: Guacamole
appetizers.description: A creamy avocado dip with lime, onion, and cilantro.
instructions: Mash avocados in a bowl.
Add lime juice, diced onion, tomato, and cilantro.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve with tortilla chips.

appetizers.name: Quesadilla
appetizers.description: Grilled tortillas filled with cheese and other ingredients.
instructions: Place cheese and chicken on half of each tortilla.
Fold tortillas in half and grill until cheese melts.
Serve with salsa and cilantro.

soup.name: Tortilla Soup
soup.description: A flavorful soup with tomatoes, chicken, and crispy tortilla strips.
instructions: Sauté onion and tomatoes, then blend into a sauce.
Add chicken broth, chicken, cumin, and chili powder.
Simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve with tortilla strips on top.

soup.name: Menudo Soup
soup.description: A traditional Mexican soup made with tripe and hominy.
instructions: Boil tripe until tender.
Add hominy, onion, garlic, oregano, and chili powder.
Simmer for 1 hour.
Serve with lime and tortillas.

dessert.name: Churros
dessert.description: Fried dough pastry dusted with sugar and cinnamon.
instructions: Boil water, sugar, and salt in a pot.
Add flour and mix until a dough forms.
Pipe dough into hot oil and fry until golden.
Dust with cinnamon sugar.
Serve with chocolate sauce.

dessert.name: Flan
dessert.description: A creamy caramel custard dessert.
instructions: Melt sugar to make caramel, then pour into a baking dish.
Whisk eggs, milk, and vanilla, then pour over caramel.
Bake at 350°F for 45 minutes.
Chill before serving.

main course.name: Butter Chicken
main course.description: A creamy and flavorful chicken dish cooked in a rich tomato and butter sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked.
Sauté onions and tomatoes, then blend into a smooth sauce.
Add chicken to the sauce, then stir in cream and butter.
Simmer for 10 minutes and serve with naan or rice.

main course.name: Paneer Tikka Masala
main course.description: Paneer cubes in a spicy and creamy tomato-based sauce.
instructions: Marinate paneer in yogurt and spices for 30 minutes.
Grill or pan-fry the paneer until golden.
Sauté onions and tomatoes, then blend into a sauce.
Add paneer to the sauce, then stir in cream.
Simmer for 10 minutes and serve with rice or naan.

appetizers.name: Samosa
appetizers.description: Spiced potato-filled pastries, deep-fried to perfection.
instructions: Boil and mash potatoes.
Mix with peas and spices.
Fill samosa pastry and fold into triangles.
Deep-fry until crispy.
Serve with chutney.

appetizers.name: Pakora
appetizers.description: Deep-fried fritters made with vegetables and chickpea flour.
instructions: Slice vegetables thinly.
Mix chickpea flour with spices and water to make a batter.
Coat vegetables in the batter and deep-fry until golden.
Serve hot with chutney.

soup.name: Dal Soup
soup.description: A hearty lentil soup with Indian spices.
instructions: Cook lentils in water until soft.
Sauté onions and tomatoes, then add to the lentils.
Add spices and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or bread.

soup.name: Tomato Shorba Soup
soup.description: A tangy and spicy tomato soup.
instructions: Blend tomatoes, onion, and garlic into a smooth paste.
Cook the paste with water and spices for 15 minutes.
Strain and serve hot.

dessert.name: Gulab Jamun
dessert.description: Soft and sweet milk-based balls soaked in sugar syrup.
instructions: Mix milk powder, flour, baking soda, and ghee to form a dough.
Shape into small balls and deep-fry until golden.
Boil sugar and water to make a syrup.
Soak the fried balls in the syrup for 2 hours.
Serve warm or cold.

dessert.name: Rasgulla
dessert.description: Soft and spongy cheese balls soaked in sugar syrup.
instructions: Curdle milk with lemon juice to make paneer.
Knead the paneer into a smooth dough.
Shape into small balls and boil in sugar syrup for 15 minutes.
Serve chilled.

main_dishes.name: Teriyaki Chicken
main_dishes.description: Grilled chicken glazed with a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce.
instructions: Mix soy sauce, mirin, sugar, ginger, and garlic to make the teriyaki sauce.
Marinate chicken in half the sauce for 30 minutes.
Grill chicken until cooked through, brushing with remaining sauce.
Serve with steamed rice and vegetables.

main_dishes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry pancetta and garlic until crispy.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan in a bowl.
Combine spaghetti, pancetta, and egg mixture. Toss well.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan.

main_dishes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
main_dishes.description: A creamy and flavorful Indian dish.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for 1 hour.
Cook chicken in a pan until browned.
Sauté onions, add tomato puree, and cook until thickened.
Add chicken and cream, simmer for 15 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan.

main_dishes.name: Beef Tacos
main_dishes.description: A classic Mexican dish with seasoned beef and toppings.
instructions: Cook ground beef in a pan until browned.
Add taco seasoning and water, simmer for 5 minutes.
Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese.
Serve with salsa and sour cream.

main_dishes.name: Sushi Rolls
main_dishes.description: A Japanese dish with rice, fish, and vegetables.
instructions: Cook sushi rice and let it cool.
Place nori on a bamboo mat, spread rice evenly.
Add salmon, avocado, and cucumber slices.
Roll tightly and slice into pieces.
Serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

main_dishes.name: Pad Thai
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water for 30 minutes.
Stir-fry tofu, eggs, and noodles in a wok.
Add fish sauce, tamarind paste, and peanuts.
Serve with lime wedges and fresh herbs.

main_dishes.name: Beef Bourguignon
main_dishes.description: A French beef stew with red wine.
instructions: Brown beef in a pot.
Add wine, broth, carrots, onion, and garlic.
Simmer for 2 hours until tender.
Serve with mashed potatoes.

main_dishes.name: Chicken Curry
main_dishes.description: A flavorful Indian curry with chicken.
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic.
Add chicken and curry powder, cook until browned.
Add coconut milk and tomatoes, simmer for 30 minutes.
Serve with rice.

main_dishes.name: Lasagna
main_dishes.description: A classic Italian layered pasta dish.
instructions: Cook beef and mix with marinara sauce.
Layer noodles, beef, ricotta, and mozzarella.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 45 minutes.
Let cool before serving.

main_dishes.name: Fish and Chips
main_dishes.description: A British classic with fried fish and fries.
instructions: Cut potatoes into fries and fry until golden.
Mix flour and beer to make batter.
Coat fish in batter and fry until crispy.
Serve with fries and tartar sauce.

main_dishes.name: Paella
main_dishes.description: A Spanish rice dish with seafood and meat.
instructions: Sauté chicken, shrimp, onion, and bell pepper.
Add rice and saffron, cook until rice is tender.
Serve with lemon wedges.

main_dishes.name: Ramen
instructions: Cook noodles according to package instructions.
Simmer pork belly in broth for 30 minutes.
Assemble noodles, broth, pork, and eggs in a bowl.
Garnish with green onions.

main_dishes.name: Moussaka
main_dishes.description: A Greek layered eggplant and meat dish.
instructions: Slice and roast eggplants.
Cook lamb, onion, and tomatoes.
Layer eggplants and lamb mixture in a dish.
Top with béchamel sauce and bake at 375°F (190°C) for 45 minutes.

soups.name: Tomato Soup
instructions: Chop tomatoes, onion, and garlic.
Sauté onions and garlic until soft.
Add tomatoes and broth, simmer for 20 minutes.
Blend until smooth, then stir in cream.
Season with salt and pepper.

soups.name: Chicken Noodle Soup
instructions: Cook chicken breast in broth until tender.
Shred chicken and return to the pot.
Add noodles, carrot, celery, and onion.
Simmer until noodles are cooked.
Serve hot.

soups.name: Minestrone Soup
instructions: Sauté onion, carrot, and zucchini.
Add tomatoes and broth, bring to a boil.
Add pasta and cook until tender.
Serve with grated Parmesan.

soups.name: French Onion Soup
soups.description: A rich and cheesy onion soup.
instructions: Caramelize onions in a pot.
Add wine and broth, simmer for 20 minutes.
Toast baguette slices and top with cheese.
Serve soup with cheesy bread on top.

soups.name: Lentil Soup
soups.description: A hearty and healthy lentil soup.
instructions: Sauté onion, carrots, and garlic.
Add lentils and broth, simmer for 30 minutes.
Blend half the soup for a creamy texture.
Serve with crusty bread.

soups.name: Clam Chowder
soups.description: A creamy and flavorful clam soup.
instructions: Sauté onion and potatoes in a pot.
Add clams, stock, and cream.
Simmer until potatoes are tender.
Serve with oyster crackers.

soups.name: Miso Soup
instructions: Heat dashi stock in a pot.
Dissolve miso paste in the stock.
Add tofu and green onions.
Serve with nori on top.

soups.name: Butternut Squash Soup
soups.description: A creamy and comforting squash soup.
instructions: Roast butternut squash and onion.
Blend with broth until smooth.
Stir in cream and nutmeg.
Serve warm.

soups.name: Pho
instructions: Simmer broth with onion and garlic.
Cook rice noodles separately.
Add beef slices to the hot broth.
Serve noodles with broth and beef.

soups.name: Gazpacho
instructions: Blend tomatoes, cucumber, bell pepper, and garlic.
Add olive oil and season with salt.
Chill for 2 hours before serving.

soups.name: Cream of Mushroom Soup
soups.description: A rich and creamy mushroom soup.
instructions: Sauté mushrooms and onion in butter.
Add broth and simmer for 15 minutes.
Blend until smooth, then stir in cream.
Serve warm.

soups.name: Wonton Soup
soups.description: A light and flavorful Chinese soup.
instructions: Boil wontons until they float.
Heat broth with soy sauce and sesame oil.
Add wontons and green onions.
Serve hot.

appetizers.name: Bruschetta
appetizers.description: A classic Italian appetizer with fresh tomatoes, basil, and garlic on toasted baguette slices.
instructions: Chop tomatoes and basil.
Toast baguette slices.
Rub garlic on toasted bread.
Top with tomato mixture and drizzle with olive oil.
Season with salt and pepper.

appetizers.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
appetizers.description: Savory mushroom caps stuffed with a flavorful breadcrumb and Parmesan mixture.
instructions: Remove stems from mushrooms.
Mix breadcrumbs, Parmesan, garlic, and olive oil.
Stuff mixture into mushroom caps.
Bake at 375°F for 20 minutes.
Serve warm.

appetizers.name: Spring Rolls
appetizers.description: Crispy fried rolls filled with fresh cabbage, carrots, and bean sprouts.
instructions: Soak spring roll wrappers in water.
Fill with cabbage, carrot, and bean sprouts.
Roll tightly and seal edges.
Fry until golden brown.
Serve with soy sauce.

appetizers.name: Deviled Eggs
appetizers.description: Creamy and tangy deviled eggs topped with paprika for extra flavor.
instructions: Cut eggs in half and remove yolks.
Mix yolks with mayonnaise, mustard, and vinegar.
Spoon mixture back into egg whites.
Sprinkle with paprika.
Serve chilled.

appetizers.name: Caprese Skewers
appetizers.description: Fresh cherry tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil on skewers drizzled with balsamic glaze.
instructions: Thread tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil onto skewers.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze and olive oil.
Serve immediately.

appetizers.name: Spinach Dip
appetizers.description: A creamy, cheesy spinach dip, perfect for serving with bread or crackers.
instructions: Mix spinach, sour cream, mayonnaise, Parmesan, and garlic.
Bake at 350°F for 20 minutes.
Serve with bread or crackers.

appetizers.name: Shrimp Cocktail
appetizers.description: Chilled shrimp served with a tangy homemade cocktail sauce.
instructions: Mix ketchup, horseradish, lemon juice, and Worcestershire sauce.
Serve shrimp with the sauce.

appetizers.name: Cheese Platter
appetizers.description: A selection of cheeses, fruits, and nuts for a perfect appetizer spread.
instructions: Arrange cheeses, grapes, crackers, nuts, and olives on a platter.
Serve at room temperature.

appetizers.name: Guacamole
appetizers.description: A creamy avocado dip with fresh lime and a hint of spice.
instructions: Mash avocados in a bowl.
Add lime juice, diced tomato, onion, and jalapeño.
Mix well and serve with tortilla chips.

appetizers.name: Chicken Wings
appetizers.description: Crispy chicken wings tossed in a spicy, buttery sauce.
instructions: Bake wings at 400°F for 40 minutes.
Mix hot sauce, butter, garlic powder, and paprika.
Toss wings in the sauce.
Serve with celery sticks and ranch dressing.

appetizers.name: Nachos
appetizers.description: Crispy tortilla chips topped with melted cheese and fresh toppings.
instructions: Layer chips and cheese on a baking sheet.
Bake at 350°F until cheese melts.
Top with salsa, sour cream, and guacamole.
Serve immediately.

appetizers.name: Hummus
appetizers.description: A smooth and creamy chickpea dip with tahini and lemon.
instructions: Blend chickpeas, tahini, garlic, olive oil, and lemon juice.
Serve with pita bread or vegetables.

dessert.name: Chocolate Cake
dessert.description: A classic chocolate cake recipe.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix all dry ingredients in a bowl.
Add wet ingredients and mix until smooth.
Pour the batter into a greased pan and bake for 30 minutes.
Let it cool before serving.

dessert.name: Cheesecake
dessert.description: A creamy and delicious cheesecake recipe.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 325°F (160°C).
Mix cream cheese and sugar until smooth.
Add eggs one at a time, then mix in vanilla.
Press graham cracker crumbs into the bottom of a pan.
Pour the mixture over the crust and bake for 45 minutes.

dessert.name: Tiramisu
dessert.description: A classic Italian tiramisu recipe.
instructions: Beat egg yolks and sugar until thick and pale.
Add mascarpone cheese and mix until smooth.
Dip ladyfingers in coffee and layer them in a dish.
Spread the mascarpone mixture over the ladyfingers.
Repeat layers and refrigerate for 4 hours.

dessert.name: Red Velvet Cake
dessert.description: A vibrant red cake with cream cheese frosting.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Add wet ingredients and mix until smooth.
Pour batter into a greased pan and bake for 25 minutes.
Let cool before frosting.

dessert.name: Apple Pie
dessert.description: A classic American dessert with a flaky crust and spiced apple filling.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Slice apples and mix with sugar and spices.
Place one pie crust in a pan and add the apple mixture.
Cover with the second crust and bake for 45 minutes.
Let cool before serving.

dessert.name: Lemon Tart
dessert.description: A tangy and sweet dessert with a buttery crust.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix flour, butter, and sugar to make the crust.
Press into a tart pan and bake for 15 minutes.
Whisk lemon juice, zest, and cream for the filling.
Pour filling into the crust and bake for 20 minutes.

dessert.name: Chocolate Mousse
dessert.description: A light and airy chocolate dessert.
instructions: Melt chocolate and let it cool.
Separate egg yolks and whites.
Whisk egg yolks with sugar, then fold in melted chocolate.
Whip cream and egg whites, then fold into the chocolate mixture.
Chill for 4 hours before serving.

dessert.name: Strawberry Shortcake
dessert.description: A light and fruity dessert with fresh strawberries and whipped cream.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Mix flour, butter, and sugar to make the shortcake.
Bake for 15 minutes.
Slice strawberries and mix with sugar.
Layer shortcake, strawberries, and whipped cream.

dessert.name: Crème Brûlée
dessert.description: A creamy custard dessert with a caramelized sugar topping.
instructions: Preheat oven to 325°F (160°C).
Whisk egg yolks and sugar until pale.
Heat cream and vanilla, then slowly mix into the egg mixture.
Pour into ramekins and bake in a water bath for 40 minutes.
Chill, then caramelize sugar on top before serving.

dessert.name: Panna Cotta
dessert.description: A silky Italian dessert with a vanilla flavor and berry sauce.
instructions: Bloom gelatin in water.
Heat cream, sugar, and vanilla until sugar dissolves.
Add gelatin and stir until dissolved.
Pour into molds and chill for 4 hours.
Serve with berry sauce.

dessert.name: Macarons
dessert.description: Delicate French cookies with a variety of fillings.
instructions: Sift almond flour and powdered sugar.
Beat egg whites until stiff, adding granulated sugar gradually.
Fold dry ingredients into egg whites.
Pipe onto a baking sheet and let rest for 30 minutes.
Bake at 300°F (150°C) for 15 minutes.

dessert.name: Pavlova
dessert.description: A meringue-based dessert topped with fresh fruit and whipped cream.
instructions: Preheat oven to 250°F (120°C).
Beat egg whites until stiff, then gradually add sugar.
Fold in vinegar and cornstarch.
Shape into a circle on a baking sheet and bake for 1 hour.
Top with whipped cream and fresh fruit.
